name: New Project Ultimate Pack - Everything NP in one pack!
description: This pack is every thing in one: 7CDs, 1 t-shirt and sticker Ultraviolent Light - Album Almost Time & Primal.Logic.Slave. EPs and singles collection: Prime Time (enhanced CD - 2003) 1. Prime Time 2. In Formation – ReFormed edit 3. Prime Time – (Zoned Re-Edit) 4. Prime Time video clip Decay (digipak numbered limited edition - 2005) 1. Decay 2. Sentinel 3. Prime Time live + bonus hidden track Side Project - Princess (enhanced CD - 2004) 1. Intro 2. Princess 3. Princess – Death From Above mix 4. Princess – Alkaline mix 5. Princess – Unplugged 6. Princess – radio friendly version 7. Princess video clip Sampler v1.0 - NP's 1st demo (2001) This CD comes in plastic sleeve 1. Generation (intro) 2. Tweaking The Cute Gene 3. The Fairy & The Reaper 4. In Formation 5. Prime Time If you would like any of these singles by themselves please contact us for pricing!

name: System Infected T-shirt + Ultraviolent Light CD
description: Heavy weight 100% cotton t-shirt. “Eye circuitry” image on front. “System Infected” and “New Project” printed on the back. One sleeve features logo. Front is full colour and writing is all in red on black t-shirt. Only men’s sizes available M,L or XL. Please choose your size at bottom of screen before adding to cart. Plus: Ultraviolent Light CD Released Nov 07, NP’s first full length album featuring the artwork of Paul Allender (Cradle of Filth/Vomitorium). 1. New Human Anthem 2. Chemical Drive 3. Cyberpunk 4. God Again 5. False Prophet 6. Coma 7. Dead Alive 8. Tear It Down 9. Ultraviolent Light 10. Forever Far Beyond Feb 2008 “Ultraviolent Light” Metal Hammer review ‘These guys have been hotly tipped as ones to watch-and the recommendations are bang on the money. Where many industrial metal outfits go wrong is by concentrating on abrassive harshness over and above actual songs. Not so here. True, vocalist Drew seems to mode himself on Dani Filth much of the time, and most of the riffing is monumentally huge, but it’s tempered by some great chant-along choruses and genuine melodic hooks-witness the deadly and crushing title track, the almost danceable ‘coma’ and chillingly hypnotic Fear Factory-esque ‘False Prophet’. The band’s ability to craft great tunes rather than just cobbling together a bunch of breezeblock riffs and giving it a title bodes well for the future. They may display their influences a touch too obviously at this stage, but, given time, this lot could be cyberstars in the making.’ If you would like this deal with another CD please let us know when making your payment.

name: Ultraviolent Light Album Autographed + Free Sticker
description: Released Nov 07, NP’s first full length album featuring the artwork of Paul Allender (Cradle of Filth/Vomitorium). Plus free sticker. Please note not all members of the band may have signed CD (this will depend on availabiltity). 1. New Human Anthem 2. Chemical Drive 3. Cyberpunk 4. God Again 5. False Prophet 6. Coma 7. Dead Alive 8. Tear It Down 9. Ultraviolent Light 10. Forever Far Beyond Feb 2008 “Ultraviolent Light” Metal Hammer review ‘These guys have been hotly tipped as ones to watch-and the recommendations are bang on the money. Where many industrial metal outfits go wrong is by concentrating on abrassive harshness over and above actual songs. Not so here. True, vocalist Drew seems to mode himself on Dani Filth much of the time, and most of the riffing is monumentally huge, but it’s tempered by some great chant-along choruses and genuine melodic hooks-witness the deadly and crushing title track, the almost danceable ‘coma’ and chillingly hypnotic Fear Factory-esque ‘False Prophet’. The band’s ability to craft great tunes rather than just cobbling together a bunch of breezeblock riffs and giving it a title bodes well for the future. They may display their influences a touch too obviously at this stage, but, given time, this lot could be cyberstars in the making.’

name: Primal.Logic.Slave EP Autographed + Free Sticker
description: 6 track EP released in 2006. Contains Kerrang's Anthem of the Week "Decay". Plus free sticker. Please note not all members of the band may have signed CD (this will depend on availabiltity). 01. Cyberpunk 02. Voice In The Machine 03. The Fairy And The Reaper 04. Chrome 05. Disconnect 06. Decay Metal Hammer Review 06 "Primal... is a blast of Die Krupps, violated by Twin Zero and virally Seduced by Emperor. Ultimately, this is a cyber metal chimera that shouldn't work, but does."

name: Almost Time EP Autographed + Primal.Logic.Slave. EP promo CD
description: Autographed copy of New Project's debut EP "Almost Time" (2002) plus a free promo copy of their "Primal.Logic.Slave." (in plastic sleeve). Plus free sticker Please note not all members of the band may have signed CD (this will depend on availabiltity). 01. Tweaking The Cute Gene 02. Prime Time 03. In Formation 04. Tweaking The Cute Gene (Spellbound Love Lounge edit) 05. Prime Time (Zoned remix) 06. In Formation (Club mix) 07. Tweaking The Cute Gene (Kasbah extended version) 08. Tweaking The Cute Gene (Spellbound dub mix) Kerang! Australia "World class stuff" Shock Records "Psychedelic Furs meet Aphex Twin. Very impressive stuff."
